comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Yet to understand how the system works though. I know of systems that work to boost social media pages and they get to use points to achieve this. Do you manage social media pages for people or you only boost their engagement capacity. As I know very well it's easier to boost posts than to manage complete social media pages.
